message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at $18000. This price reflects not only the value of the product but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you've placed on the product, my budget for this purchase is $15000.  I'd be happy to move forward if you're willing to consider that price.
